00047 /****************************************************************************

00049 ** SpecialValueList class

00051 ** Represents a list of pre-defined (special) values.
00052 **
00053 *****************************************************************************/
00054 
00063 class SpecialValueList : public TItemList
00064 {
00065 public:
00066     // Constructor.
00067     SpecialValueList();
00068 
00069     enum specialId {
00070             ID_NOSPECIAL    = 0,    
00071             ID_EMPTY        = 1,    
00072             ID_NOVALUE      = 2,    
00073             ID_UNUSED       = 4,    
00074             ID_DEFAULT      = 8,    
00075             ID_BAD          = 16    
00076     };
00077 };
